content.query:
-- ALTER VIEW gso.dim_visits
-- AS

SELECT
     [SURVEY_KEY]
    ,CAST(left([VISIT_DATE],10) as date) as [VISIT_DATE]
    ,[VISIT_PRODUCT]
    ,CAST([TOTAL_VISITS] as int) as [TOTAL_VISITS]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://gsksynapseaccount.dfs.core.windows.net/gskoutputfiles/GSO/dimensao_visits.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) WITH( 
             [SURVEY_KEY]       VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 
            ,[VISIT_DATE]       VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
            ,[VISIT_PRODUCT]    VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
            ,[TOTAL_VISITS]     VARCHAR(250) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 ) as ROW
